attributes.action: Make Britain great again by stating that Britain has its own laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: and that all are welcome as long as they realise Britain is British we have our own laws, religion, schools and we speak English if immigrants want this then welcome if not leave the country for somewhere they will be accomodated if they want to stay here then learn the language and abide by our laws and do not push your religion down british throats.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
